channel.title: ADMIN PROblemS
channel.description:
Ok i got a ps and my friend is owner and he has pickup, i trust him but he have been giving p hats just randomly can someone help me to dissable trade for him ?
i want the stuff he drops to dissapea when he drops also

item.title: ADMIN PROblemS
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

here you go! I’m gonna be like drub, and give you a special tutorial!

lmgtfy.com

LMGTFY

LMGTFY

Read full topic

item.title: ADMIN PROblemS
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Under4545:

Well considering he asked a beginner type question, i was asuming that he was using delta. Im pretty sure most people start with a delta 317, so this is why i asumed that.

This is off topic, but most people start on the highest deob possible with the most features…

Take a good look around here and you will find out how many people try to start on a 614 and ask basic questions like “How do i spawn npcs?” if they cant do the basics they cant do anything else…

OT

Like i said,

if he does that, then he really doesn't deserve owner in the first place

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: ADMIN PROblemS
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Under4545, post:2, topic:379118”]Ok first thing would be what kind of server do you have? Is it a 317 or 508 or what? Im going to asume that you are using a 317 because they are for beginners, so what you do is you open up ur source files, and click on client.java and hit ctrl + f and search int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX; then you should see something like"if(action == 1){ return; } if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){ sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); return; } if(other.action == 1){ return; }
Now under the bottom of that code add

if(playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; }
Now you can edit your player rights to your liking, Hope i helped[/quote]

First, let me clear some things up

317 isnt the “easiest” thats only because delta is easy… pi too… well most wL servers… go try hyperion tell me if thats as easy as wL servers.

Honestly, making your friend a owner on a private server is a rookie mistake, you wont get as many people, and if he does that, then he really doesn’t deserve owner in the first place, just make the spawning command so only you can do it i guess.
Unless its for admins or something…

Read full topic

item.title: ADMIN PROblemS
item.dc:creator: @Under4545 Under4545
item.description:
@Under4545 wrote:

Ok first thing would be what kind of server do you have? Is it a 317 or 508 or what? Im going to asume that you are using a 317 because they are for beginners, so what you do is you open up ur source files, and click on client.java and hit ctrl + f and search int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX; then you should see something like"if(action == 1){ return; } if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){ sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); return; } if(other.action == 1){ return; }
Now under the bottom of that code add

if(playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; }
Now you can edit your player rights to your liking, Hope i helped

Read full topic
